text.config.chromaticarsenal.option.COMM: The duration of the Golden Heart's Absorption effect, in ticks. The effect is refreshed after this many ticks pass.
The amplifier of the Golden Heart's Absorption effect.
After blocking a hit, it will take the Glass Shield this many ticks to recover.
Magic damage received while wearing a Ward Crystal is multiplied by this value.
Magic damage dealt while wearing a Ward Crystal is multiplied by this value.
The highest possible light level in which the Shadow Treads' effect will activate. Note that very low values may not function as expected.
The speed increase caused by the Shadow Treads' effect. 0.2 is equal to +20%%.
text.config.chromaticarsenal.option.CLIE: Whenever ticks are converted to seconds in a tooltip, the decimal is kept if the resulting amount of seconds is under this value.
